product_name: REI Merino Wool Arm Warmers - Women's
long_description: Perfect for cold-weather urban outings, the REI Merino Wool arm warmers will up your comfort and style. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Arm warmers are 11 in. long; can be layered under long sleeves or tucked under short sleeves to extend coverage. Thumb loops keep the REI Merino Wool arm warmers covering the backs of your hands.
short_description: Perfect for cold-weather urban outings, the REI Merino Wool arm warmers will up your comfort and style.
